judges: Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts and Pomeroy, JJ.

casebody.head_matter:
Fred Whitaker Company, Appellant, v. Philadelphia Tax Review Board.
Argued November 12, 1969.
Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts and Pomeroy, JJ.
Paul W. Lunhenheimer,. with him Schumacher and Lunkeriheimer, for appellant.
Levy Anderson, First Deputy City Solicitor, with him Edward G. Bauer, Jr.} City Solicitor, for board, appellee.
March 20, 1970:
